amendment.description: To prohibit warrantless access to the communications and other information of United States persons.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1841, as modified, not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 42 - 50. Record Vote Number: 148.

action.text: Amendment SA 1841 proposed by Senator Durbin.
